comments.body: @flokli this doesn't seem to have an effect on the build, there is no ~/.bazel-cache on the disk after the VM boots up

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@su --login vsts <<'CACHE_WARMUP'
# user-wide bazel disk cache override
echo "build:linux --disk_cache=~/.bazel-cache" > ~/.bazelrc

# clone and build
